text: Isiaka Abiola Ajimobi (16 December 1949 â€“ 25 June 2020) was a Nigerian politician from Oyo State. He was elected in 2003 as a Senator of the Republic of Nigeria representing Oyo South Senatorial District on the platform of the Alliance for Democracy (AD). After one term in the senate, he contested in 2007 the governorship of Oyo state under the banner of the All Nigeria People's Party, a bid which he lost.Tinubu reconciles Lam Adesina, Ajimobi . The Nation (24 October 2009) He was also an oil businessman. He died from COVID-19 on 25 June 2020, aged 70. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Lagos Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Nigerian businesspeople Category:People from Oyo State
title: Abiola Ajimobi
